article_metadata.description: Hard-right Republicans said they shut down the government to stop Obamacare and “restore patient-centered healthcare in America.” Huh? "Patient-centered healthcare." Really? The ACA can be accused of many failures, but it's the most patient-centered law ever.
article_metadata.author: Michael Millenson

og.title: GOP's Oddest Obamacare Objection
